Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱりわかんねえな…… どうして憎んでる相手と旅ができるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Man, I just don't get it... How can someone travel alongside someone they hate?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あいつはあいつなりに 迷っている。
Entry.EnglishText: She has her own doubts about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: はぁ……まったく めんどくさい事してるよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh.. Geez, the way she goes about it is a pain, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな<Tytree>みたいに 大ざっぱに生きてないの。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, the rest of us can't live our lives being blissfully unaware like you are.

Entry.JapaneseText: こう見えてもおれは けっこうナイーヴなんだぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: Well I may not look like it, but I'm a pretty honest guy.
